recipe.title: Sweet Potato Shepherd's Pie
ingredients: 1 cup Broccoli and Red Bell Pepper Mix
instructions: Combine all filling ingredients in a bowl; mix well. Spread into a 10" pie plate.

Topping: Combine all topping ingredients except chives in a bowl. Spread on top of filling. If not serving immediately, cover and freeze. Or bake at 400° until top browns, about 20 minutes. Garnish with chives.
